des: "Why buy expensive name-brand coffee creamers when it's this easy to make even better-tasting ones? Place a piece of tape on the container and write the expiration date of the heavy whipping cream on it before refrigerating."
ins: Pour sweetened condensed milk, cream, chocolate syrup, caramel syrup, and vanilla extract in a sealable container. Seal the container and shake until mixture is completely combined. Store in the refrigerator.
